title: What to Talk About: On a Plane, at a Cocktail Party, in a Tiny E
description:
What to Talk About: On a Plane, at a Cocktail Party, in a Tiny Elevator with Your Boss's Boss


ISBN: 1452114501 | 2014 | EPUB/PDF | 160 pages 

Learn how to talkÃ¢â‚¬â€fluently, intelligently, charminglyÃ¢â‚¬â€to family, friends, lovers, future lovers, bank tellers, postal carriers, and people under the age of eight. This hilarious manual tackles the fundamentals of good conversation with common sense, social wisdom, and enough humor to make us all feel better about ourselves. Written by two comedians and illustrated by legendary cartoonist Tony Millionaire, What to Talk About features an encyclopedia of tried-andtrue topics, conversational "pinatas" to jump-start a dead discussion. Perfect for the graduate or introvert (or loudmouth), this handy, giftable hardcover will inspire a hearty laugh at the absurd conversational challenges we all face in our daily lives.
